<template>
  <v-card style="width: 70%">
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="2" style="background-color: black"></v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-card-textarea>
          {{ post.content.rendered }}
        </v-card-textarea>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="2" style="background-color: black"></v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      content: this.content,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    deleteC() {
      this.$emit("deleteC");
    },
  },
  created() {},
};
</script>
